name: Roughish Rabbit
description:
Hey! This is just a small game I made. This is my first game ever so pleas don't expect anything great. I might update the game later so look forward to that ;)

Can you beat the Highscore? 

Send me a screenshot of your highscore and get your own custom character in my next Project!

Current Highscore:                        Ve1t -  74 Points
